renovate.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to repair a building or old furniture so that it is in good condition again
renovate.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The hotel has been renovated and redecorated.
renovate.translation[1].definitions[0].d: to repair and improve a building so it is in good condition again
renovate.translation[1].definitions[0].e: The company was awarded a $72 million contract to renovate a train terminal.
